snippets.title: AWS Hackathon Grand Prize
snippets.text: Jason's team won Grand Prize at AWS AI Hackathon Hong Kong 2025, competing against 130+ shortlisted teams.

snippets.title: 14-Day Development Sprint
snippets.text: The Bay Management System was built in just 14 days using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, AWS Q Developer, and Kiro AI.

snippets.title: Media Coverage
snippets.text: Jason was featured in 4 media interviews including unwire.hk, SCMP, HAECO internal media, and AWS Hong Kong.

snippets.title: AWS re:Invent Las Vegas
snippets.text: Jason traveled to Las Vegas for AWS re:Invent conference and was interviewed on-site about the winning project.

snippets.title: Bay Management System
snippets.text: An AI-based aircraft bay scheduling optimization platform that automates bay assignments and provides real-time analytics for HAECO operations.

snippets.title: HAECO Co-op Internship
snippets.text: Jason completed a 5-month Co-op at HAECO Technology Innovation department from September 2025 to January 2026.

snippets.title: HAECO Techathon Lead Organizer
snippets.text: Jason solely organized HAECO's first-ever Techathon from scratch, including framework design and 3 GM pitch meetings.

snippets.title: Techathon Framework
snippets.text: Designed comprehensive Techathon roadmap with pitch sessions, team formation, and innovation challenges for HAECO employees.

snippets.title: Lean Day Master of Ceremony
snippets.text: Jason served as MC at HAECO Lean Day 2025, engaging executives and hundreds of attendees in front of large audiences.

snippets.title: Lean Day Sharing Session
snippets.text: Presented the AWS Hackathon winning project and shared innovation insights at HAECO Lean Day 2025.

snippets.title: Co-op Handover Documentation
snippets.text: Created comprehensive handover package documenting all projects, learnings, and recommendations for future interns.

snippets.title: Hackathon Demo Video Production
snippets.text: Jason produced the 3-minute AWS Hackathon demo video that showcased the Bay Management System and helped win Grand Prize.

snippets.title: HKUST Engineering Degree
snippets.text: Currently pursuing BEng in Industrial Engineering and Engineering Management with Minor in Big Data Technology at HKUST.

snippets.title: HKU SPACE Data Science
snippets.text: Completed Higher Diploma in Data Science at HKU SPACE with Academic Excellence Award and Principal's Honor List.

snippets.title: Final Year Project
snippets.text: FYP focuses on Efficient Data-Driven Methods for Inventory Control using JIT, Monte Carlo simulation, AutoML, and Multi-Agent Systems.

snippets.title: Programming Skills
snippets.text: Proficient in Python, R, Octave, SQLite, and SQL for data analysis and software development.

snippets.title: AI Development Tools
snippets.text: Experienced with AWS Q Developer, Krio, OpenAI Codex, and AutoML for rapid AI-driven development.

snippets.title: Creative Production
snippets.text: Skilled in Adobe Creative Suite, Canva, and MS Office for photo/video editing and digital media production.

snippets.title: Multilingual Communication
snippets.text: Fluent in English, Cantonese, and Mandarin for effective communication across diverse audiences.

snippets.title: Class Representative Leadership
snippets.text: Served as Class Representative managing 80+ students in Data Science program at HKU SPACE.

snippets.title: HAECO 75th Anniversary
snippets.text: Participated in celebrating HAECO's 75th Birthday during the Co-op internship period.

snippets.title: Contact Information
snippets.text: Reach Jason at wcauyeungaa@connect.ust.hk for inquiries about AI-driven solutions and operations optimization.

snippets.title: Professional Soft Skills
snippets.text: Strong capabilities in critical thinking, leadership, teamwork, negotiation, and decision-making.

snippets.title: Speedy Group IT Support
snippets.text: Part-time IT operations and digital media production role at Speedy Group since July 2021.

snippets.title: HKUST ITSO Internship
snippets.text: Completed IT support and asset management internship at HKUST ITSO from February to June 2026.
